conclusion: Initial velocity (v0) = 20 m/s, Distance to puppy (x) = 45 m, Reaction time (Δt) = 0.5 s
Distance covered during reaction time (xr) = v0 × Δt = 10 m
The bus decelerates uniformly from 20 m/s to 0 m/s over a time interval of 4 s
Stopping distance (s) calculated using v² = u² + 2as results in s = 40 m
Total stopping distance (xtotal) = xr + s = 50 m
The total stopping distance of 50 m is greater than the distance to the puppy (45 m)
The puppy is not safe because the coach bus will cover 50 m before stopping, which is more than the 45 m distance to the puppy
